name: tm92
effect: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user creates a bizarre space in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
flavor_text.platinum: The user creates a bizarre space in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user creates a bizarre space in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
